name: sadl-client
description: A prototype for editing SADL in a browser.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:src && npm run build:serverextension
scripts.build:serverextension: cd sadl_web && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:jupyterlab: here=`pwd` && cd ../../../jupyterlab && npm install && npm run clean && npm run build && cd ${here}
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf build && rimraf test/build
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=Chrome test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:test && webpack --config test/webpack-cov.conf.js && karma start test/karma-cov.conf.js
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=ChromeCanary --singleRun=false --debug=true test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=Firefox test/karma.conf.js
scripts.test:ie: npm run build:test && karma start --browsers=IE test/karma.conf.js
scripts.update:jupyterlab: npm run build:jupyterlab && npm run clean:jupyterlab && npm install && npm run build:all
scripts.watch:test: watch 'npm run build && npm run build:test' src test/src --wait 10
